name: Gangsta Auto Thief - Reckless Gang.sta City Hustle
name_original: Gangsta Auto Thief - Reckless Gang.sta City Hustle
description:
Gangsta Auto Thief: Reckless Hustle in San Gangster City is the first game in a new game series.

Hardcore dynamic gameplay includes 2 Power Ups. The Cash Magnet generates.. well, loads of CASH, but you're not the only one into the dough. Everyone and their mama will be coming after it! And the Maximum Velocity power up... Well, you gotta see that beast for yourself!

Earn cash to unlock new vehicles, or visit the Ghetto Cash Exchange Store to instantly stack up on more cash!

Who's the sickest gangsta slash car thief?


Welcome to the city of Crime. Explosions. Tanks. Helicopters. Undercover Police. And a whole lot of mayhem!

DOWNLOAD THIS GAME NOW!
